AakashTel allows you to dial any phone number on the web with a single click. Make calls instantly and improve your productivity.

AakashTel chrome extension is a software program that allows users to make and receive phone calls directly from their web browser. This can be done by clicking on a phone number on a website or by entering a phone number into the extension's dialpad.

AakashTel chrome extensions offer a number of benefits, including:

Convenience: Users can make and receive calls without having to switch between their web browser and a traditional phone.
Cost-effectiveness: Cloud telephony service chrome extensions are typically more affordable than traditional phone systems.
Flexibility: Users can make and receive calls from anywhere with an internet connection.
